title: The Witch’s Requiem - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Army   Brother Complex   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Magic   Misunderstandings   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Strong Love Interests
author: 봄티
description:
Ariel Elias, a librarian at the magician’s library.
Her only family member, her younger brother, died in the army.
And eventually a change in the military organisation was announced, saying they would now recruit magicians as soldiers.
And so, Ariel decides to join the army.

The best magician in Dantela, Jean Kreuz.
He begins showing questionable interest in this lady.
Ariel is at a loss for words at Kreuz’s actions......
Could it be that he was related to the death of her brother?
Just what kind of secrets was this man hiding?
>
